entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @PippaCrerar @NikNakGB I don’t think he will. I think he’s going to herd immunity Which means that at least 60 to 80% of British residents will have to have had COVID-19 which means more death more suffering more family is torn apart Boris Johnson does not care.
